overview: This fun and aggressive series returns with four hot, mean stories sure to raise viewers' temperatures and get pulses racing. Wife Dana Vespoli catches her husband's mistress, foxy Jessie Andrews in a compromising position, and teaches the young girl a lesson not soon to be forgotten...Evil boss Chanel Preston goes too far with meek assistant Keira Kelley, who exacts her revenge late one night...Beauty pageant coach Nikki Hunter loses her patience as she prepares bratty contestant Taylor Vixen for an upcoming competition, and teaches the girl the meaning of respect. Finally Elle Alexandra exacts revenge on her colleague, Ash Hollywood, after she discovers that Ash sabotaged her chance to go to Paris. Every scene features the passion, connection, and mind blowing orgasms that mark Sweetheart as the best lesbian studio out there.
title: Lesbians In Charge 3
